message.content:
cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.DS, cs.MA, cs.SY

The paper discusses model-free reinforcement learning algorithms for Markov Decision Processes (MDPs), which are commonly studied in the machine learning and artificial intelligence communities. The paper also mentions the use of adaptive algorithms for adversarial multi-armed bandits, which is a topic often studied in the machine learning and optimization communities. Therefore, the most likely sub-categories are cs.LG (Machine Learning), cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), and cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms). Additionally, since the paper deals with decision-making under uncertainty, it could also be categorized under cs.MA (Multi-Agent Systems) and cs.SY (Systems and Control).
